QuestData.Title: The Shrine Reclaimed
QuestData.Description: Yes $n, I am Goldrinn. Your persistence in the face of fear has unbound me from twilight's grasp.$B$BMy shrine has been purified, and my worshippers have returned to their rightful place at my right paw.$B$BReturn to Ian and continue your work here in Hyjal. I will have need of you again soon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Ian Duran at the reclaimed Shrine of Goldrinn in Hyjal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ian Duran at the reclaimed Shrine of Goldrinn in Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: $n, it was astounding! Goldrinn himself appeared to free us, his white fur bright like the summer moon. Our cages collapsed and the vandals melted like wax under the kiss of his claws. He was beautiful, $n. Beautiful!
